T02D2037:136b-1: shr'i rakta ya m'a ri dz'i bam tattva au pa de sha n'a ma /
T02D2037:137a-1: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 'tsho ba'i de kho na
T02D2037:137a-2: nyid ces bya ba'i man ngag / dpal gshin rje
T02D2037:137a-3: gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2037:137a-4: dag cing dri med bdud bzhi 'joms //
T02D2037:137a-5: dpa' bo gshin rje gshed btud de //
T02D2037:137a-6: dpal ldan gshin rje gshed rgyud las //
T02D2037:137a-7: sbas pa bla ma'i lung gis bshad //
T02D2037:137a-8: phyi dang nang dang gzhan rnams kyis //
T02D2037:137a-9: dus dgra'i tshul 'di shes bya ste //
T02D2037:137a-10: lho phyogs sa 'og rim pa bdun //
T02D2037:137a-11: sgo med mun khung bcu drug gnas //
T02D2037:137a-12: chos kyi rgyal po'i las kyi 'khor //
T02D2037:137a-13: bye ba 'bum bcas gshin rje ste //
T02D2037:137a-14: grub pa'i dngos grub phun sum tshogs //
T02D2037:137a-15: zhal gcig phyag gnyis nyi ma'i mdog ltar gsal //
T02D2037:137a-16: ma he la bzhugs de yi gshed yin te //
T02D2037:137a-17: lhar bcas 'jig rten kun gyi gtsug gis mchod //
T02D2037:137a-18: gdug cing gtum pa'i skye bo gang //
T02D2037:137a-19: log par ltung ba gshin rje yin //
T02D2037:137a-20: snying rjes bstan la gzhug pa'i phyir //
T02D2037:137a-21: tshar gcod pa ni gshed yin no //
T02D2037:137a-22: k'a li ya ste a'a li ma //
T02D2037:137a-23: g-yas dang g-yon pa gshin rje ste //
T02D2037:137a-24: kun 'dar ma ni dbus gnas su //
T02D2037:137a-25: gang zhig gnyis su med de gshed //
T02D2037:137a-26: nyi ma zla ba'i lam gnyis por //
T02D2037:137a-27: 'gro ba gang yin gshin rje ste //
T02D2037:137a-28: de yang dbus su gang gnas pa //
T02D2037:137a-29: ye shes de ni gshed yin no //
T02D2037:137a-30: mnan pa'i snying gi dbus song rtsa //
T02D2037:137a-31: nyon mongs ngo bo nyid yin no //
T02D2037:137a-32: srid pa'i rtsa ba gshin rjer bshad //
T02D2037:137a-33: rnal 'byor pa la tshul de nyid //
T02D2037:137a-34: yang dag ye shes nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2037:137a-35: de ni de yi gshed yin no //
T02D2037:137a-36: gzung ba ya ste 'dzin rtog ma //
T02D2037:137a-37: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i kun rtog na //
T02D2037:137a-38: 'khor ba'i rtsa ba gshin rje ste //
T02D2037:137a-39: aa ni rnam par skye ba med //
T02D2037:137a-40: ri ni gang yin snying rje'o //
T02D2037:137a-41: stong nyid snying rje ro gcig pa //
T02D2037:137a-42: mi gnas mya ngan 'das te gshed //
T02D2037:137a-43: gang zhig lus ngag sems kyi ni //
T02D2037:137a-44: snyigs ma gang yin gshin rje ste //
T02D2037:137a-45: sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyis ;
T02D2037:137a-46: / dngos por gyur pa gshed yin no //
T02D2037:137a-47: mdor na srid pa'i kun rtog tshogs //
T02D2037:137a-48: gang yin gshin rje gshed po ste //
T02D2037:137a-49: rnam par dag pa'i ye shes sku //
T02D2037:137a-50: kun mkhyen pa ni gshed du gsungs //
T02D2037:137a-51: lte snying mgrin pa spyi bor ni //
T02D2037:137a-52: bdud bzhi gnas pa gshin rje ste //
T02D2037:137b-0: mthar byed @137b bzhi ni gshed yin no //
T02D2037:137b-1: ya la sogs pa'i yi ge ni //
T02D2037:137b-2: ma dag las kyi gshin rje ni //
T02D2037:137b-3: mi bzad srid pa'i las kyis bzir //
T02D2037:137b-4: dag pas dpal ldan dus kyi dgra //
T02D2037:137b-5: srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol zhing //
T02D2037:137b-6: dngos grub bde chen mchog ster yin /
T02D2037:137b-7: ya ma gnyis su 'dzin pa ste //
T02D2037:137b-9: ka yig bla mas bstan pa nyid //
T02D2037:137b-10: gshin rje mthar byed ces byar grags //
T02D2037:137b-11: 'tsho ba zhes bya srog tu brjod //
T02D2037:137b-12: 'tsho ba'i dbye ba zhes bya ba //
T02D2037:137b-13: 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i srog /'od gsal rnam par mi rtog pa //
T02D2037:137b-14: srog gi gsang 'di gang gis shes//
T02D2037:137b-15: thams cad grub cing rang dbang 'gyur //
T02D2037:137b-16: gzhan yang srid dang zhi ba las //
T02D2037:137b-17: srog ni de bzhin gnyis su brjod //
T02D2037:137b-18: dangs ma dang ni snyigs ma gnas //
T02D2037:137b-19: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa //
T02D2037:137b-20: bla ma'i thugs su shes bya ste //
T02D2037:137b-21: mi phyed brtan pa'i gus pa yis //
T02D2037:137b-22: ltos pa med pa'i bsnyen bkur bya //
T02D2037:137b-23: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pas //
T02D2037:137b-24: mi 'gyur ba ni srog gi mchog / de las gzhan pa'i bskyod pa yi //
T02D2037:137b-25: yig 'bru rnams dang phyag mtshan dang //
T02D2037:137b-26: phyag rgya snying po la sogs pa //
T02D2037:137b-27: rgyal ba sras bcas srog yin te //
T02D2037:137b-28: dad pas thugs dam bskul bar bya //
T02D2037:137b-29: stong nyid snying po'i snying rje can //
T02D2037:137b-30: rnal 'byor lam pa rnams kyi srog / dngos grub chen po 'dod rnams kyi //
T02D2037:137b-31: srog ni dam tshig sdom pa yin //
T02D2037:137b-32: rnal 'byor pa rnams bsgrub bya ba //
T02D2037:137b-34: yon tan 'byung gnas srog gcig tu //
T02D2037:137b-35: byang chub sems ni kun 'dar brjod //
T02D2037:137b-36: bla ma lhag pa'i lha rnams kyi //
T02D2037:137b-37: byin brlabs srog ni mi phyed pa'i //
T02D2037:137b-38: gus pas brtan pa med na min //
T02D2037:137b-39: de las gzhan pa 'jig rten pa'i //
T02D2037:137b-40: 'byung po phal che'i srog gi gnas //
T02D2037:137b-41: srog dang 'tsho ba dang ni tshe //
T02D2037:137b-42: 'di rnams dbye bas shes par bya //
T02D2037:137b-43: rtsa ba'i srog ni sngon bzhin no //
T02D2037:137b-44: sa steng 'byung po kha cig gi / dbugs rlung srog tu nges pa yin //
T02D2037:137b-45: 'byung po rnams kyi rang rang gi / bod pa'i sngags dang sa bon dang //
T02D2037:137b-46: ma ni rnams ni srog yin no //
T02D2037:137b-47: sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la //
T02D2037:137b-48: me sa brgyan dbyangs kyi gsum pas brgyan //
T02D2037:138a-2: de las gzhan pa 'byung po'i srog / kha cig gnas la gnas pa yod //
T02D2037:138a-3: zhug shang la sogs gnas pa ni //
T02D2037:138a-4: kha cig rdzas la brten te gnas //
T02D2037:138a-5: kha cig rang gi grib mar gnas //
T02D2037:138a-6: kha cig phyi yi 'byung bar gnas //
T02D2037:138a-7: nor bu ri rab gos la sogs //
T02D2037:138a-8: kha cig sman dang kha cig dug / kha cig 'gro ba gzhan gyi gzugs //
T02D2037:138a-9: sa steng 'byung po rnams kyi srog / bdag gi rtsal gnas pa yin //
T02D2037:138a-10: de la sogs pa du ma yis //
T02D2037:138a-11: srog gi dbye ba sna tshogs pa //
T02D2037:138a-12: 'di ru brjod par mi nus so //
T02D2037:138a-13: mi rnams kyi ni srog gyur pa //
T02D2037:138a-14: ming dang ming yin dang po dang //
T02D2037:138a-15: rnam par shes pa tshe gzugs yin //
T02D2037:138a-16: gza' dang rgyu skar la sogs pa //
T02D2037:138a-17: mdor na brtan g-yo ma lus pa'i //
T02D2037:138a-18: srog ni phyi dang nang du gnas //
T02D2037:138a-19: rnam rtog ma rig chen po ste //
T02D2037:138a-20: 'khor bar gnas pa rnams kyi srog / stong nyid snying rje mi 'gyur ba de //
T02D2037:138a-21: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'i srog / srid pa dang ni mya ngan 'das //
T02D2037:138a-22: rtsa yi bdag nyid lus la gnas //
T02D2037:138a-23: lte ba mgrin snying spyi bo la //
T02D2037:138a-24: rlung me chu sa zhes bya ba //
T02D2037:138a-25: phrag dog zhe sdang chags dang rmongs //
T02D2037:138a-26: lus ngag yid gsum mi phyed gnas //
T02D2037:138a-27: bdud bzhi po ni rnam par gnas //
T02D2037:138a-28: sdug bsngal kun 'byung lam dang 'gog / bden pa bzhi yi ngo bo nyid //
T02D2037:138a-29: rgyu mthun rnams smin skyes bu can //
T02D2037:138a-30: dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu bzhi //
T02D2037:138a-31: srid pa'i skye gnas bzhi po dang //
T02D2037:138a-32: ae wam ma ya yi ge bzhi //
T02D2037:138a-33: de bzhin ya ma r'a dza bzhi //
T02D2037:138a-34: spyan dang m'a ma gos dkar sgrol //
T02D2037:138a-35: yum bzhi pho ni rnam pa ste //
T02D2037:138a-36: gshin rje shes rab padma dang //
T02D2037:138a-37: bgegs zhes bya ba mthar byed bzhi //
T02D2037:138a-38: tshad med bzhi dang mthar byed bzhi //
T02D2037:138a-39: dga' ba bzhi dang skad cig bzhi //
T02D2037:138a-40: dam tshig las chos phyag rgya che //
T02D2037:138a-41: phyag rgya che yi rang bzhin no //
T02D2037:138a-42: rigs bzhi ye shes bzhi yi dngos //
T02D2037:138a-43: sku bzhi ye shes bzhi dang ldan //
T02D2037:138a-44: khams gsum la sogs thams cad kyi //
T02D2037:138a-45: bdag nyid chen po rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2037:138a-46: bdud kyi bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir //
T02D2037:138a-47: de phyir gsang ba bshad par bya //
T02D2037:138a-48: a'a li k'a li'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2037:138a-49: lus ngag yid gsum bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D2037:138a-50: bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar gsal bas //
T02D2037:138b-0: a'a li @138b k'a li rab brjod pas //
T02D2037:138b-1: spyi gtsug nas ni rkang mthil bar //
T02D2037:138b-2: shes rab thabs kyis bskor phyogs su //
T02D2037:138b-3: mi phyed par ni bcing bar bya //
T02D2037:138b-4: a'a li k'a li rtsa gnyis po //
T02D2037:138b-5: thabs dang shes rab yi ges bsrung //
T02D2037:138b-6: gnyis med rtsa ni rdo rjes bsrung //
T02D2037:138b-7: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid do //
T02D2037:138b-8: rang gi gsang sngags rgyal po la //
T02D2037:138b-9: shes rab thabs kyi ye shes mchog / thog ma nas ni mtha' ru sbyar //
T02D2037:138b-10: aom a'a:h'um phat sbyor ba yi //
T02D2037:138b-11: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje yis //
T02D2037:138b-12: rang gi gsang sngags brtan par 'gyur //
T02D2037:138b-13: rang ming rigs kyi yi ge dag / ya dang ma yi nang bcug ste //
T02D2037:138b-14: a'a li k'a li gnyis med pa'i //
T02D2037:138b-15: za ma tog gi nang son la //
T02D2037:138b-16: lto ba'i chu skyes 'og tu sba //
T02D2037:138b-17: brgya byin gyis kyang mi tshugs na //
T02D2037:138b-18: sha za phra mo smos ci dgos //
T02D2037:138b-19: thabs dang shes rab ro gcig pa //
T02D2037:138b-20: rnam par mi rtog bde ba che //
T02D2037:138b-22: lhag pa'i bsrung ba gzhan med do//
T02D2037:138b-23: sa bcu pas kyang mi phyed do //
T02D2037:138b-32: aom ma ra pa tsa mum h'um phat /
T02D2037:138b-40: shes rab yi ges 'jig rten dang //
T02D2037:138b-42: rtag tu sgrub pa po rnams la //
T02D2037:138b-43: thabs kyi yi ge brtan par 'gyur //
T02D2037:138b-44: yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02D2037:138b-45: lhag pa'i lha ni mnyes par bya //
T02D2037:138b-47: blo ldan slob mas bskul ba'i phyir //
T02D2037:138b-48: me long ltar gsal bya sa pa la //
T02D2037:138b-49: bla ma lhar bcas bzod mdzad rigs //
T02D2037:138b-50: dge ba gang des 'gro ba kun //
T02D2037:138b-51: bdud bzhi'i dgra las rgyal gyur cig / dpal gshin
T02D2037:138b-52: rje gshed kyi 'tsho ba'i de kho na nyid ces
T02D2037:138b-53: bya ba / rgya gar gyi pandi ta darpa na a'a ts'arya'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2037:138b-56: // / rgya gar gyis ndi ta dngos grub brnyes pa darpana a'a ts'arya de nyid dang /
T02D2037:138b-57: glo bo lo ts'a ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis /
